Lyric:
[00:16.890]We pray for blessings, we pray for peace
[00:25.010]Comfort for family, protection while we sleep
[00:33.260]We pray for healing, for prosperity
[00:41.080]We pray for Your mighty hand to ease our suffering
[00:49.460]And all the while, You hear each spoken need
[00:57.890]Yet love us way too much to give us lesser things
[01:05.010]'Cause what if your blessings come through rain drops
[01:09.080]What if Your healing comes through tears
[01:13.080]What if a thousand sleepless nights are what it takes to know You're near
[01:23.580]What if trials of this life are Your mercies in disguise
[01:31.640]
[01:39.580]We pray for wisdom, Your voice to hear
[01:47.580]We cry in anger when we cannot feel You near
[01:56.040]We doubt your goodness, we doubt your love
[02:03.670]As if every promise from Your word is not enough
[02:12.040]And all the while, You hear each desperate plea
[02:20.000]And long that we'd have faith to believe
[02:27.470]'Cause what if your blessings come through rain drops
[02:31.660]What if Your healing comes through tears
[02:35.660]What if a thousand sleepless nights are what it takes to know You're near
[02:45.220]
[02:45.790]What if trials of this life are Your mercies in disguise
[02:54.040]
[02:58.160]When friends betray us
[03:02.160]When darkness seems to win
[03:06.240]We know that pain reminds this heart
[03:09.610]That this is not,
[03:12.110]This is not our home
[03:15.050]
[03:33.770]It's not our home
[03:34.700]'Cause what if your blessings come through rain drops
[03:37.960]What if Your healing comes through tears
[03:42.020]What if a thousand sleepless nights are what it takes to know You're near
[03:50.520]What if my greatest disappointments or the aching of this life
[03:58.710]Is the revealing of a greater thirst this world can't satisfy
[04:09.090]What if trials of this life
[04:13.580]The rain, the storms, the hardest nights
[04:18.270]Are your mercies in disguise
